Articles.Content:
So, it turns out that:

1) Some mod developers strongly dislike Curse and its alternatives for various reasons.

2) I have plenty of bandwidth and storage to spare on one of my servers.

So, I am writing this to offer up some of my resources to the KSP community. Need that 123Mb mod hosted somewhere with no ads? I'll do it for you at no charge.

Why, you may ask? Because too many times in the past have I been lacking online storage space without a catch. I want to make sure that anyone who has material that benefits the KSP community gets a chance to share their work.

So if anyone's interested, drop me a line, and we'll see what can be arranged depending on the requirements.2

----

PS:

- This isn't necessarily restricted to mods, but anything KSP-related.
